body.transcript:
Hello! Thank you for calling Harmonious Notes Music School. My name is Jose Hill. May I have your name, please?

Hi, my name is Emma Adams.

Nice to meet you, Emma! How can I assist you today?

I’m feeling a bit anxious about the privacy of my personal information with the school.

I understand your concerns, Emma. We take privacy very seriously. Just to make sure I have the correct details, could you please provide me with your enrollment ID?

My enrollment ID is zero zero five four three.

Thank you, Emma. Also, can I confirm the email address we have on file for you?

It's emma.adams@example.com.

Great, I have located your details. I assure you that we comply with all data protection laws and have robust systems in place to protect your information.

Thank you, Jose. That makes me feel a bit better.

You're welcome, Emma. If you have any other questions or concerns, feel free to reach out. Thank you for your time and have a wonderful day!
